bibl.title: The Text of Galatians: Evidence from the Earliest Greek Manuscripts.
bibl.note: A collation of Papyrus 46 (= van Haelst 497) and codexes Vaticanus, Sinaiticus, and Alexandrinus.

bibl.title: Scribes and Scripture. New Testament Essays in Honor of J. Harold Greenlee

bibl.seg: SILVA Moisés, The Text of Galatians: Evidence from the Earliest Greek Manuscripts.
David Alan BLACK (Ed.), Scribes and Scripture. New Testament Essays in Honor of J. Harold Greenlee (Winona Lake, Indiana, 1992) pp. 17-25, 1 tabl.
A collation of Papyrus 46 (= van Haelst 497) and codexes Vaticanus, Sinaiticus, and Alexandrinus.
